definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter

sentences.english: "It is my grandmother's prescription, " Ancelotti said.
sentences.chinese: “這是我祖母的祕方，”安切洛蒂說。

sentences.english: For centuries, nay, millenniums, men have been trying to figure out how to have more sex.
sentences.chinese: 多少個世紀了，男人們一直在不懈地尋找這種祕方。

sentences.english: Like its predecessor, Kentucky Fried Chicken has its own secret recipe.
sentences.chinese: 和它的前輩一樣，肯德基烤雞肉也有自己的祕方。

sentences.english: Here's a seven-step recipe for cooking up your own investment mix.
sentences.chinese: 以下是烹製自己的投資組合時應該掌握的七個祕方。

sentences.english: Many effective prescription will become a matter of course the recipe.
sentences.chinese: 許多有效的方劑也就理所當然的成爲祕方。

sentences.english: Tyranny is the secret acne acne preparation.
sentences.chinese: 是祕方配製的專治青春痘痤瘡的。

sentences.english: Now it looks as if it might be part of the original family recipe.
sentences.chinese: 目前看來，它可能早已是人們家傳食物祕方的一部分。

sentences.english: The students will have to study the production process involved in the development of this syrup and the so-called subtleties that are involved.
sentences.chinese: 學生必須學習生產糖漿的過程，及其所謂的祕方。

sentences.english: Secret prescription containing Sino-Thai herbal ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 祖傳祕方，中泰草藥成份。

sentences.english: Secret recipe created by the founders of Ginza Bairin in 1927.
sentences.chinese: 豬扒祕方醬汁是由創始人在1927年發明的。

sentences.english: Goods Brief:specially formulated for use by the ancient China's princess and concubines.
sentences.chinese: 此草本藥鹽乃古中國宮廷特爲王妃所配製的祕方。

sentences.english: The secret ingredient of my Secret Ingredient Soup is nothing.
sentences.chinese: 我那祕方仙湯的祕方是不加料。

sentences.english: The secret ingredient of my Secret Ingredient Soup is nothing.
sentences.chinese: 我那祕方仙湯的祕方是不加料。

sentences.english: Have paronychia folk to treat secret recipe excuse me?
sentences.chinese: 請問有沒有甲溝炎民間治療祕方？

sentences.english: Your secret formula is just the red cabbage juice which contains the pigment.
sentences.chinese: 你的祕方就是紫甘藍汁，其中含有色素。

definition: (Tw) trick (of the trade)/clever move/(Taiwanese, Tai-lo pr. [phiat-pōo])
widely spread/widely rumored/stories abound/(sb's exploits are) widely circulated
passed on from ancestors/handed down from generation to generation
to nourish one's skin/to maintain a youthful appearance
Temujin, birth name of Genghis Khan 成吉思汗[Cheng2 ji2 si1 han2]
